references.paper_title: Multimodal data fusion for cancer biomarker discovery with deep learning
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its focus on multimodal data fusion for cancer research, directly aligning with the core theme and application of the HEALNet paper.

references.paper_title: Towards Transparent AI Systems: Interpreting Visual Question Answering Models
references.reason: This work is cited as a foundational reference in the field of multimodal learning, providing a relevant comparison to multimodal approaches involving images and textual data.

references.paper_title: Multimodal Transformer With Multi-View Visual Representation for Image Captioning
references.reason: This paper presents a relevant multimodal architecture for tasks involving images and text, offering a comparative approach relevant to image-based biomedical data fusion.

references.paper_title: Foundations and Trends in Multimodal Machine Learning: Principles, Challenges, and Open Questions
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of multimodal machine learning, covering key challenges and future directions highly relevant to the HEALNet study.

references.paper_title: Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy
references.reason: This survey paper offers a broad overview of multimodal learning, contextualizing HEALNet within the wider landscape of multimodal architectures and strategies.
